product_name: The North Face Bella Rain Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Suitable for year-round use, The North Face Bella rain jacket gives you fully waterproof, breathable protection and packs down small so it's ready to go whenever and wherever you need it. HyVent DT EC maintains excellent waterproof, breathable performance; jacket is fully seam sealed. HyVent DT EC substitutes natural (bean-derived) castor oil for 50% of the petroleum-based materials previously used in the manufacturing process. Pit zippers allow cooling airflow as your activity heats up. Adjustable hood has hidden drawcords. Full-length front zip with chin guard; drawcord hem; 2 zippered hand pockets; rip-and-stick cuffs. The North Face Bella jacket packs down small and stows in 1 hand pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Suitable for year-round use, The North Face Bella rain jacket gives you fully waterproof, breathable protection and packs down small so it's ready to go whenever and wherever you need it.
